name: Alice's Easy Blueberry Cake
author: JLI1108
summary: This is a delicious and easy blueberry cake to make with things that are usually on hand. My grandmother passed this down to me and now I make it with my kids.
ingredients: 2 teaspoons all-purpose flour, or as needed
2 tablespoons white sugar, or more to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C)
Grease and flour a 9x13-inch baking dish
Sift 2 1/2 cups flour, 1 1/2 cup sugar, baking powder, and salt together in a bowl
Add milk, vegetable oil, eggs, and vanilla extract; mix into a semi-thick batter
Toss blueberries with about 2 teaspoons flour in a separate bowl; fold into batter
Pour batter into prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until cake is lightly browned, 25 to 30 minutes
Brush melted butter on top of cake and sprinkle with about 2 tablespoons sugar
Continue to bake until golden brown and a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean, 5 to 10 more minutes
